entry.title: Berlin Bitcoin Hackathon
entry.summary: On June 22, 2012, Amir Taaki posted on the Bitcoin-development mailing list about the Bitcoin Hackathon happening in Berlin. He mentioned that he is happy to host if space is needed. The event was aimed at discussing all the ways today's security and threat landscape has changed and how IT managers can respond. Discussions included endpoint security, mobile security, and the latest in malware threats. Mike Hearn responded to the email stating that he has booked flights and will be attending the event along with Amir Taaki. The link provided in the email showed more details about the hackathon.
